    • addMovie

      public void addMovie​(Movie movie) throws ValidatorException
      Calls the repository save method with a certain Movie Object
      Parameters:
      movie - created movie object to be passed over to the repository
      Throws:
      ValidatorException - if the entity is not valid.
      MyException - if there exist already an entity with that MovieNumber

    • updateMovie

      public Movie updateMovie​(Movie movie) throws ValidatorException, MyException
      Calls the repository update method with a certain Movie Object
      Parameters:
      movie - created movie object to be passed over to the repository
      Returns:
      the updated object
      Throws:
      ValidatorException - if the entity is not valid.
      MyException - if there is no entity to be updated.

    • deleteMovie

      public Movie deleteMovie​(java.lang.Long id) throws ValidatorException
      Given the id of a movie it calls the delete method of the repository with that id
      Parameters:
      id - the id of the movie to be deleted
      Returns:
      the deleted Movie Instance
      Throws:
      ValidatorException - if the entity is not valid.
      MyException - if there is no entity to be deleted.

    • getAllMovies

      public java.util.Set<Movie> getAllMovies()
      Gets all the Movie Instances from the repository
      Returns:
      Set containing all the Movie Instances from the repository

    • filterMoviesByTitle

      public java.util.Set<Movie> filterMoviesByTitle​(java.lang.String title)
      Filters all the movies out by title
      Parameters:
      title - a movie title of type String
      Returns:
      HashSet containing all the Movie Instances from the repository that contain the title parameter in the title
